itemDescription: (1948–1987), physician and founder of the British Association for Cancer United Patients

wikipedia_page.main: Vicky Veronica Clement-Jones (née Yip; 23 December 1948 – 30 July 1987) was a Hong Kong-born English physician and medical researcher. Her own diagnosis with ovarian cancer led her to found the British Association for Cancer United Patients (BACUP) in 1984.
